author: Brandjuh
description: Scrapes alliance income and expense data from MissionChief USA. Tracks both daily and monthly financial data for trend analysis.
install_msg:
✅ Income Scraper installed!

Use `[p]load incomescraper` to enable.

Commands (owner only):
• `[p]scrape_income` - Manual scrape

Automatic scraping runs every hour at :30

Database: scraper_databases/income.db
Tabs: daily and monthly income/expenses
short: Alliance income/expense tracker with daily and monthly data
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores scraped MissionChief financial data in a local SQLite database.
